metadata.title: CVE-2018-8036 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.14 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.10, a carefully crafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop which leads to an out of memory exception in Apache PDFBox's AFMParser.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-8036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
No subscription required

libfontbox2-java - 2.0.11-1
libpdfbox2-java - 2.0.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.15-1').
libpdfbox2-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1').
